Public Remarks: This 153 acre property is accessed on the Owen East FSR and is located at the west end of Francois Lake in the Northern Interior of BC. Small pine and spruce has regenerated in this area. Excellent views from the top of a bench overlook grassy meadows and rolling hills. A small creek runs through the middle of the property. Nadina River offers great canoeing opportunities, wildlife abounds in this pristine setting. A recreational retreat or an excellent hunting and fishing base of operations.
